Reviews.Title: “Decent Budget Hotel”
Reviews.Author: GarethEdwards1977
Reviews.Content: looking luxury accomodation try savoy road â£500 night nice clean warm court hotel fine sheets bed clean little cosy top floor clean bed clean sheets sink shower cubicle bonus id expected ensuite facilities stayed cold february night glad nice warm sleep bargain price location excellent 5 mins walk tube short journey westend close hyde park staff friendly professional helpful

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for.”
Reviews.Author: Artcrawl
Reviews.Content: ok budget faced road 4 floors lot road noise slept ear plugs makes waking alarm difficult obviously occupant smoked toilet set fire alarm smelled ash tray 45 days approx week breakfast means toast thats toast lobby standing front reception desk eat dont bothered real issue following elevator 4 floors winding tiny stair suitcases havent gym couple months forget theyre help bags getting ready sleep top theyre else unless store shower cubical night talking lot kidding kinda fit cant toilet door reception staff okish initially cold times smiled

Reviews.Title: “Do not book into Room 11!”
Reviews.Author: Elle B
Reviews.Content: boyfriend booked hotel week ok yes budget hotel werent expecting ritz horrendous reception 11 sliding door shower toilet waste time light disappointed definitely understatement dealt noise accompanied stench churning toilet carpet dirty torn bed creaked breath change course booked photos hotel advertise indeed misleading pay attention tourist photos accurate thankfully staying superior stay london price cheaper unfortunately thats risk booking hotels

Reviews.Content: booked toilet shower arrival reception manager told booked conveniences booking papers persuaded manager provide iron shower cabin climbed narrow loft stairs passed closed fire door wornout attic tv series war sherlock holmes water shower cabin cold lamp wash worst leaky window cold dark depressing sleeping roaming streets daytime night block wind blowing press curtains windows using drinking glass electrical toothbrush shirt bath curtain extra insulating hooking real curtains pressing lowest bath curtain wall using bed needles hotel suitable staying winter time nor recommend elderly people families children recommend lancaster court hotel

Reviews.Title: “Only 1 point for location”

Reviews.Content: hotel situated forget breakfast breakfast extremely loud 7am basement door light street lamps night hotel unfortunately kept looks nice site inside improvement forget waking late cleaners start 8am loud breakfast toast croissant coffee black tea butter jam met cousin london stayed hostel hotel cheaper recommend hotel enjoy london day rest night

Reviews.Content: lancaster court hotel nicely located paddington railway station underground station lancaster gate underground station shower sink ok bed sleep 3rd floor window facing street sussex gardens busy earplugs trouble sleeping shower bit awkward water pressure low hose toilet corridor free oldfashioned tv tho channels poor quality hang news nice breakfast bit tiny crowded times service swift friendly breakfast basic sufficient staff reception friendly wifi available pound hour public pc utilized opinion wifi free charge guests days lack quality service luggage available safe impression notice hotel front door locked times stayed beginning june surroundings green looked spacious easily connect city bus underground youre looking luxury settle basic sleep recommend

Reviews.Content: unfriendly staff shower didnt sent public shower looked gas chamber wornout furniture totally abandoned owner told wifi complained reception internet companys fault wasnt hotel london dont upset

Reviews.Content: book friday saturday party hotel weekends gangs teenage foreign travellers leap yelling 5 morning pretty horrific walls stairs paperthin hordes youngsters stumbling drunk throughout night wont wink sleep reception complain knock door scare utterly shocked disgraceful service weekend passed lovely quiet stay strange

Reviews.Title: “Good location”

Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights 5th december found hotel centrally located shopping tourist close londons main railway station paddington 34 mts walk unfortunately positive hotel quality ordinary cleanliness attached toilet drawback

Reviews.Content: location roof bed 3 2 square metre shower inside outside awful breakfast painting furniture doors didnt avoid travel family girlfriend stay cheap sleep

Reviews.Title: “failure in all counts! paying for location only.”
Reviews.Author: Cl2aZy
Reviews.Content: chose hotel cheap price location horribly shocked absolutely lack service attitude service staff decently clean sheets toilets clean cellar toilet cold heaters toilet power sockets wouldnt power nightmare wrong key id figured didnt notice morning time entered wasnt locked didnt wrong key till tomorrow morning dinning hall breakfast naturally locked breakfast tried unlock door able staff nonchalant keen help told tour catch attitude horrible apologies instead accusing spoiling lock funny tried master key avail time call mechanic arrival mechanic door set keys flash inspecting lock mechanic told fault wrong key confronted front desk staff fault blatantly retorted own mechanic fault immediately changed statement saying experience eventually taxi catch local tour incurring stress cost hotelmotel please visit service attitude atrocious clean

Reviews.Content: unfriendly service smile cost broken glass dampness wall hallway tiny paper hanging cieling filthy carpet bed linnen clean priced hey london breackfast consisted diluted orange choice coffee tea toast white choice dont wait else eat comming worst ive stayed

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely discusting”
Reviews.Author: dansker53
Reviews.Content: pictures internet low rate bed breakfast lots narrow stairs 4th floor website indicates respectable elegant pictures fooled absolutely discusting stayed 2 nights stayed 1 night staff reception helpful manager premisses staff authority solve breakfast experience staff indifferent

Reviews.Title: “Hotel from Hell!”
Reviews.Author: AngieH22
Reviews.Content: hotel location excellent stones throw hyde park managed prebook parking space awful im glad stayed 1 night booked double ensuite double basement shower cubicle corner sink toilet described cupboard desperate decorating windows didnt lock properly dont recommend leaving valuable teacoffee tray job own morning couldnt shower hotel water forgot mention bed sleeping concrete slab paid booked travelodge 10 times recommend hotel worst enemy friends

Reviews.Title: “Overrated, even for London”
Reviews.Author: jesseliz
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel greeted told sharply pay arrival key top floor carried exremely heavy packs flights stairs occupied embarrasing stairs top floor building walk bags top floor werent frame mind arrived tiny shower corner toilet tiny bed sloped horribly sink decor charming leave key reception found little strange especially hand wrong keys time walked past reception complaining internet expensive price below par wish stayed else

Reviews.Title: “just a few improvements”
Reviews.Author: Gizmo_kitkat
Reviews.Content: location beside lancaster gate tube station handy walks hyde park outside looks little bit shabby doesnt matter staff fantastic staff desk helpful giving directions superior ensuite bathroom shoehorned cupboard fine tea coffee breakfast fine tea coffee toast eat found cooked breakfast available kitchen advance front hotel noise wasnt bad form city night time noise doesnt bother bigger tea coffee nice hey cares

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for money in Central London”
Reviews.Author: goldengirlathome
Reviews.Content: bit worried previous reviews arrived apprehension worried received warm welcome desk found recently decorated spotless sheets nice shower day couple nice pubs nearby meals close tube station italian garden hyde park enjoyable trip maybe depends quiet
